title: Pamela Anderson & Trendy Lee 4/13: The Ultimatum, NYC, Ben Shapiro, NBA, Clayton Kershaw, Spokane, The Villages
itunes:title: Pamela Anderson & Trendy Lee 4/13: The Ultimatum, NYC, Ben Shapiro, NBA, Clayton Kershaw, Spokane, The Villages
description:
In this edition of Pamela Anderson & Trendy Lee, Jack and Miles discuss 'The Ultimatum' finale, the NYC subway shooting suspect, Ben Shapiro getting clowned, NBA news, Clayton Kershaw pitching 7 perfect innings, Spokane-style pizza trolls, and voter fraud at The Villages.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
